title: Usutu
creator_credit: Stephen Peet, Raymond Spottiswoode, Courtaulds and Film Centre
brief_description: Describes a large afforestation project in Swaziland, which involved the planting of 50 million trees and the construction of a specially designed pulp mill. With the forest grew a new town, with schools, clinics and other social amenities.
creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Peet, Raymond Spottiswoode, Courtaulds and Film Centre
